    1. getDone(ClosingFuture)

Class ClosingFuture.Peeker

java.lang.Object
com.google.common.util.concurrent.ClosingFuture.Peeker
Enclosing class:
ClosingFuture<V extends @Nullable Object>
public static final class ClosingFuture.Peeker extends Object
An object that can return the value of the ClosingFutures that are passed to ClosingFuture.whenAllComplete(Iterable) or ClosingFuture.whenAllSucceed(Iterable).

Only for use by a ClosingFuture.Combiner.CombiningCallable or ClosingFuture.Combiner.AsyncCombiningCallable object.

Since:
30.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final <D extends @Nullable Object>
    D
    getDone(ClosingFuture<D> closingFuture)
    Returns the value of closingFuture.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getDone

      public final <D extends @Nullable Object> D getDone(ClosingFuture<D> closingFuture) throws ExecutionException
      Returns the value of closingFuture.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if closingFuture is a failed step
      CancellationException - if the closingFuture's future was cancelled
      IllegalArgumentException - if closingFuture is not one of the futures passed to ClosingFuture.whenAllComplete(Iterable) or ClosingFuture.whenAllComplete(Iterable)
      IllegalStateException - if called outside of a call to ClosingFuture.Combiner.CombiningCallable.call(DeferredCloser, Peeker) or ClosingFuture.Combiner.AsyncCombiningCallable.call(DeferredCloser, Peeker)
